summary: DT:  2001 FLEETWOOD TERRA 31H.  THE CONSUMER STATES THERE IS A PROBLEM WITH THE STEERING.  WHILE DRIVING OVER A BRIDGE OR ON A  ROUGH PATCH OF THE ROAD THE FRONT END SHAKES.  THE FOLLOWING YEAR THIS MODEL HAS BEEN RECALLED.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN IN TO A DEALERSHIP WHILE ON VACATION, AND THEY COULD NOT DUPLICATE THE PROBLEM.  WHEN DRIVING HOME FROM VACATION THE PROBLEM RECURRED.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO DEALER  AGAIN AND STILL NOTHING WAS FOUND.  THE VEHICLE IS STILL UNDER WARRANTY, BUT FLEETWOOD WILL NOT FIX THE VEHICLE.  THIS HAPPENS MORE AT 55-65 MPH.*AK

CONSUMER RECEIVED RECALL  NOTICE  FOR  SAMSUNG MICROWAVE.  CONSUMER  CONTACTED  MANUFACTURER, AND  MAYTAG SENT 2 SEPARATE SERVICE CONTRACTORS TO SERVICE THE MICROWAVE. THE MICROWAVE WAS DISASSEMBLED AND IS CURRENTLY INOPERABLE. *AK  *MR
